title: Jerusalem Artichoke and Lima Bean Sauté
directions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add artichokes and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add peppers and beans. Stir to coat with butter. Season with salt and pepper. Add water, cover and cook until limas are tender, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pound Jerusalem artichokes (sun chokes), scrubbed, quartered lengthwise, cut crosswise into 1/8-inch-thick slices
1 10-ounce package frozen baby lima beans, thawed
